plain_text.description: CC-News containing news articles from news sites all over the world The data is available on AWS S3 in the Common Crawl bucket at /crawl-data/CC-NEWS/. This version of the dataset has 708241 articles. It represents a small portion of English  language subset of the CC-News dataset created using news-please(Hamborg et al.,2017) to collect and extract English language portion of CC-News.
